Name: before
Desc: Inserts content before each element in the current set of matched elements.
Long Desc: The 'before' method allows developers to insert content immediately before each element in the set of matched elements. The content can be a string of HTML, an HTMLElement, a Q object, an array of elements, or a NodeList. This method is useful for dynamically adding elements to the DOM in a specific order, ensuring that the new content appears before the target elements.
Example:
Q(selector).before("

New paragraph

"); // Adds a paragraph as HTML
